patternSteps.2: Step 1. Turn the face to B while forming a right bending ready A toward B. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a high side piercing kick to B with the left foot. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Execute a high side piercing kick to B with the left foot. Perform 2 and 3 in a double kick.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Lower the left foot to B to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the right flat fingertip.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Execute a high reverse hooking kick to B with the right foot. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Lower the right foot to B in a jumping motion to form a right X-stance toward C while executing a middle side strike to B with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Move the left foot to A forming a left walking stance toward A while executing a pressing block to A with the right palm.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Move the right foot to A to form a right walking stance toward A at the same time executing a pressing block with the left palm.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Execute a high side block to B with the left knife-hand and a low side block to A with the right knife-hand while forming a right one-leg stance toward D, pulling the left reverse footsword to the right knee joint. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Lower the left foot to the right foot and then turn the face to A while forming a left bending ready stance A toward A. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Execute a high side piercing kick to A with the right foot. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Execute a high side piercing kick to A with the right foot. Perform 11 and 12 in a double kick.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Lower the right foot to a to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the left flat fingertip.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Execute a high reverse hooking kick to A with the left foot. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Lower the left foot to A in a jumping motion to form a left X-stance toward C while executing a middle side strike to A with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Move the right foot to B forming a right walking stance toward B while executing a pressing block to B with the left palm.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Move the left foot to B to form a left walking stance toward B at the same time executing a pressing block with the right palm.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Execute a high side block to A with the right knife-hand and a low side block to B with the left knife-hand while forming a left one-leg stance toward D, pulling the right reverse footsword to the left knee joint. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Turn the face to C while forming a left bending ready stance B toward D.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Execute a high back piercing kick to C with the right foot. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Lower the right foot to C to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Turn the face to C while forming a right bending ready stance B toward D.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Execute a high back piercing kick to C with the left foot. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Lower the left foot to C to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the left fist.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Slide to C forming a right rear foot stance toward D while executing a downward block with the left palm.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute a middle side front snap kick to D with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 25.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Lower the left foot to D and then move the right foot to C in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a middle side strike to C with the right side fist.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Slide to C maintaining a sitting stance toward A while executing a scooping block with the left palm.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Execute a middle punch to A with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward A. Perform 28 and 29 in a connecting motion.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Execute a low side block to D with the left knife-hand while maintaining a sitting stance toward A.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Move the left foot just beyond the right foot in a quick motion while executing a middle side pushing kick to C with the right foot.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Lower the right foot to C and then execute a high reverse turning kick to C with the left foot.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Lower the left foot to C to form a left walking stance toward C while executing a high side block to C with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Slide to D forming a left rear foot stance toward C while executing a downward block with the right palm.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a middle side front snap kick to C with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 34.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Lower the right foot to C and then move the left foot to D in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a middle side strike to D with the left side fist.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Slide to D maintaining a sitting stance toward A while executing a scooping block with the right palm.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Execute a middle punch to A with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward A. Perform 37 and 38 in a connecting motion.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Execute a low side block to C with the right knife-hand while maintaining a sitting stance toward A.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Move the right foot just beyond the left foot in a quick motion while executing a middle side pushing kick to D with the left foot.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Lower the left foot to D and then execute a high reverse turning kick to D with the right foot.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Lower the right foot to D to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a high side block to D with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.44: Step 43. Move the left foot to D and then execute a high twisting kick to AD with the right foot.
patternSteps.45: Step 44. Lower the right foot to C forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a side back strike to C with the right back fist and extending the left fist to D.
patternSteps.46: Step 45. Execute a front strike to D with the right back fist while shifting to C maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.47: Step 46. Move the right foot to D and then execute a high twisting kick to BD with the left foot.
patternSteps.48: Step 47. Lower the left foot to C to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a side back strike to C with the left back fist and extending the right fist to D.
patternSteps.49: Step 48. Execute a front strike to D with the left back fist while shifting to C maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.50: Step 49. Execute a sweeping kick to D with the left side sole keeping the position of the hands as they were in 48 and then lower it to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.51: Step 50. Execute a side checking kick to D and then again a middle side thrusting kick to D with the left foot forming a forearm guarding block. Perform in a consecutive kick.
patternSteps.52: Step 51. Lower the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle outward strike to D with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.53: Step 52. Execute a sweeping kick to D with the right side sole and then lower it to D to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.54: Step 53. Execute a side checking kick to D and then again a middle side thrusting kick to D with the right foot forming a forearm guarding block. Perform in a consecutive kick.
patternSteps.55: Step 54. Lower the right foot to D forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle outward strike to D with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.56: Step 55. Move the right foot to C and then turn counter clockwise pivoting with the right foot to form a left walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the right fist.
patternSteps.57: Step 56. Jump to C to form a right X-stance toward AC while executing a low punch to C with the left fist and bringing the right fist on the left shoulder.
patternSteps.58: Step 57. Jump to D forming a left X-stance toward AD while executing a low punch to D with the right fist and bringing the left fist on the right shoulder.
patternSteps.59: Step 58. Jump to execute a mid-air kick to D with the right foot while spinning clockwise.
patternSteps.60: Step 59. Land to D to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.61: Step 60. Move the right foot to the side rear of the left foot and then the left foot to C to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a rising block with the left arc-hand.
patternSteps.62: Step 61. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.63: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
